text: Nyasaye shiyarakho amakanio kosi kosi khu Bahira(ingamia itetungwa eshirwi niyibule abana barano wokhumwisho abe weshisatsa.) nohomba saiba(ingamia iyebungwa	abanyasaye	omundu nahonokoshe mumatinyu) nohomba wasila( ingamia ihebungwa abanyasaye omundu niyibule omwana wa ambeli weshikhasi nende ulondakho weshikhasi) 5. nohomba hami ( ni ingamia isatsia ilaninumgwakho tawe nikali mbu yilusiye omwana wo omwana wayio), halali abakhayi bachishilanga Nyasaye obubeyi, ne abanji mubo shibekhonyelanga obwongo tawe
